subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer will face off for the Open title on Sunday, pitting the up-and-comer against the man trying to win his fourth Open in a row.
snippet: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer will face off for the Open title on Sunday, pitting the up-and-comer against the man trying to win his fourth Open in a row.
